name: Push Notification
description: Send push notifications to users via configurable backend. Supports Expo Push Notifications (React Native), with extensible architecture for other notification backends.
author: guangqiu86

backendUrl.description: URL of the notification backend service (e.g., https://your-api.com)

apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with the backend service

defaultTitle.description: Default notification title when not specified

enabled.description: Enable or disable the push notification tool
